yes its a strip joint but its also a steakhouse and the girls keep their bottoms on i personally wanted to experience it but they made us wait over 30 minutes for a table and we had a reservation so we didnt get the peep show or to try the steaks too bad
the food is outstanding the hostess is delightful the lush green grass in the backyard enhances the setting and mannys ability to imitate voices is incredibly impressive

i heard a lot of positive things about this place so i decided to see what all the hype was about i was very disappointed with everything the wing sauce was mostly oil and didnt taste good at all save your money and dont eat here

i will not be reconsidering as the level of assistance provided is even more unsatisfactory if thats feasible they mishandled my pizza request by neglecting to send a replacement topping at some stage during the delivery process it was also delayed which does not justify the experience however in urgent situations and under the influence i suppose this establishment is acceptable
the service was a bit lacking in speed and the quality of the food was just average

indeed it is a venue that offers both adult entertainment and serves steak surprisingly the dancers maintain their modesty by keeping their bottoms covered i was personally eager to partake in this unique experience however we faced a frustrating delay of more than half an hour despite having made a reservation consequently we were unable to indulge in the anticipated peep show or savor the tantalizing steaks it is truly disappointing

the quality of service we encountered during our visit can only be described as incredibly lacking despite investing a considerable amount of time our food never made its way to our table dissatisfied and disheartened we chose to cut our losses and seek out another thai restaurant that could fulfill our desires needless to say recommending this particular location to others is out of the question
being a firsttimer at oreganos i found their pizza to be satisfactory but not exceptional it made me contemplate trying something else on my next venture there

undoubtedly you wont find a more exceptional and bona fide mexican dining experience in the city of sin with prices that wont break the bank after sinking your teeth into your inaugural serving of tacos its guaranteed that youll be drawn back for another round at tacos el gordo surpassing anything ive sampled in socal where authentic mexican flavors reign supreme
the service is commendable the food is great for vegetarians and overall its an exceptional place to relax and enjoy delicious options from their deli counter

if it were possible for me to not give any stars whatsoever i most certainly would recently i made a purchase of several pizzas on behalf of my office when i called in to place the order the representative advised that the estimated delivery time would be somewhere between 30 and 45 minutes unfortunately it has been two hours since then and we are still here eagerly awaiting our meal needless to say this experience has left us feeling extremely unimpressed with the quality of service provided by glass nickle pizza to the point where we will not be considering them as an option for future orders
this was my initial experience at oreganos the pizza was satisfactory but not exceptional maybe i should explore other options next time
the food is fantastic the hostess is delightful the backyard has beautiful grass to create a great ambiance and manny possesses impressive skills in voice acting
children will absolutely adore this fantastic show
if youre looking for a remarkable place to indulge in delicious pizza this spot stands out from the rest and frequently features incredible discounts on their impressive collection of beers

the level of customer service at this place is absolutely abysmal its hard to fathom that it could be any worse my pizza order was completely mishandled leaving me emptyhanded without a replacement on top of that they had the audacity to deliver a pizza with the opposite toppings that i requested considering their consistently tardy deliveries and lack of reliability one could reluctantly deem this establishment passable when desperate or under the influence

if you inquire about it the shop is open to discussing price adjustments but the degree of flexibility may vary depending on the bike model you desire nonetheless when compared to larger establishments such as az hd or hacienda their overall visual appeal may fall short however their minimal expenses might lead to potential monetary benefits for customers

the three waiters taking care of our table displayed rudeness while the calamari failed to impress the chili was not properly cooked and the mussels and wings were just passable this disappointing experience left me feeling quite dissatisfied
this place offers some of the most delicious food around particularly their exceptional breads salads and soups

the service we received at this establishment was absolutely abysmal despite being there for an extended period of time our food was never brought to us we ultimately decided to leave and continue our search for a new thai restaurant as this particular place fell far short of our expectations it is safe to say that we would not recommend it to anyone

my decision has been made  i wont be returning here for customer assistance despite the possibility of worse service they managed to ruin my pizza order by neglecting to include the correct toppings and failed to rectify the situation by sending a replacement to make matters worse the delivery was inconveniently delayed making it difficult to justify patronizing this establishment however in desperate times or when inebriated i suppose this place may still be tolerable
i truly adore this spot for its topnotch cuisine their bread salads and soups are simply fantastic

in my opinion this is the only chinese restaurant available in the neighborhood if youre interested you can take the subway and visit chinatown but please note that it is pricey and does not offer anything extraordinary

regrettably my 200th review is dedicated to this runofthemill american irish pub although the music choices were commendable they failed to align with the establishments ambiance moreover the staff appeared inattentive and my booth seat was literally caving in furthermore the restroom proved to be disgustingly unclean adding insult to injury i had to shell out 7 for a disappointingly tiny whiskey cranberry ultimately i will not be patronizing this place again

can you evaluate the service atmosphere culinary offerings vegetarianfriendly choices and overall greatness of this establishment furthermore would you consider it a delightful destination for a leisurely dining experience with the added bonus of an exceptional deli counter

over the years downtown glendale dtg has experienced an increase in enjoyment due to various events like the blues festival chocolate festivities and glendale glitters the local shops have managed to survive the recession quite well and more are making a comeback as a resident of glendale i am thrilled about the abundance of exciting activities in dtg and eagerly anticipate many more years of such enjoyable experiences

i think theyve gone out of business phones turned off and website is down for the past week when they were open they were good at what they did cheap americanized fast food chinese delivery im sad and now looking for another dive chinese place that delivers to arcadia

the fresh and topnotch selection of produce and fish at this establishment is unparalleled the level of their service has always exceeded expectations mark your calendar for wednesday as it is the prime time to pay a visit it allows you to reap the benefits of the previous weeks sales converging with the new weeks sales all in one day
nice shop will work with you on price if you ask but its limited depending on the bike you want overall hd presentation wont compare to az hd or hacienda but that lower overhead may save you money

i believe the establishment has closed down as their phones are disconnected and their website has been offline for a week they used to provide affordable americanized fast food chinese delivery and i am feeling disappointed now that i have to find another chinese place that delivers in arcadia

i cant contain my excitement over their mouthwatering cupcakes i just wish they didnt have any calories despite the hefty price of 325 dollars and beyond for one cupcake they still earn 4 stars because lets face it most individuals are willing to pay exorbitant amounts for a cup of coffee its a matter of personal preference when it comes to indulging in treats

we had an incredibly disappointing time at this restaurant due to the terrible service despite staying there for an hour our food was never served to us and we eventually decided to leave clearly this establishment did not live up to our hopes of finding a new thai spot and i would advise against recommending it to anyone

the food has consistently been of good quality though i have observed a slight decrease in service speed since the introduction of new management and chef i strongly suggest trying the macadamia nut chicken as it is incredibly delicious
my debut encounter at oreganos left me with mixed feelings about their pizza  it was alright but not extraordinary it could be worth considering something new during my next visit

after all the positive things i heard about this place i was eager to see for myself what the hype was about sadly everything ended up being a letdown the wing sauce consisted mainly of oil and was far from tasty my advice would be to keep your cash and steer clear of this restaurant
no question about it when it comes to relishing an unparalleled taste of mexico in the entertainment capital tacos el gordo is unmatched in value once youve savor

you get good value for your money when it comes to enjoying traditional malaysian food not only is the taste exceptional but also the establishment exudes a warm familial ambiance reminiscent of a small business the prospect of contributing to a young boys education through my patronage is appealing

unfortunately my 200th review is for this typical american irish bar  the music selection was decent but unsuitable for the atmosphere the service lacked attention and my booth seat was collapsing moreover the bathroom was utterly repulsive to top it off i paid 7 for a minuscule whiskey cranberry in conclusion i have no intention of returning
some of the best chow aroundlove this place the bread and salads and soups are great

youll be impressed by the impeccable service the vegetarianfriendly options available making it an ideal destination to sit down and relish the exquisite delicacies offered by their amazing deli counter
the waiters subpar performance might be an indication that they are part of a union
somewhat slow service and the food was only soso
this was a great show kids will love it

its a shame how packed and smelly the venue was the beverage i ordered was decent and the cost was acceptable a rather clumsy individual managed to spill my drink because they were too busy ogling my wife while she was dancing on the bar i cant really blame him for being captivated and he did make up for it by purchasing me another drink nonetheless i have my doubts about going back there again

driven by the overwhelming positive reviews i made it a point to see for myself what made this place so popular unfortunately much to my dismay it did not live up to the hype the wing sauce proved to be a letdown heavily dominated by oil and severely lacking in flavor to avoid wasting your money it would be prudent to give this eatery a pass

daaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaamnnncheap jeans galore i didnt buy anything because i wasnt in the market for denim but had i been i could have walked out of there in a new canadian tuxedo for pretty cheap nnevery style is sold at discounted prices for men women and children denim dan anybody
i had my inaugural experience at oreganos the pizza was decent but not extraordinary perhaps i should opt for a different choice on my next visit
terrible service we were there for an hour and never served our food we finally left we were looking for a new thai spot and this certainly wasnt it would never suggest this place to anyone

this is by far the worst chinese cuisine i have ever experienced in my lifetime the wonton soup lacks any flavor the meat is undercooked and the dumplings have an uncanny resemblance to playdoh  theres no chance of me returning here for another meal

considering the scarcity of chinese dining establishments in this vicinity your best bet would be this restaurant however the cost may be on the steeper side without much to set it apart from other places

omg nnmy dreams have come true bbq around the corner from my house is there a 6 star option food is amazing i run or walk by here everyday if i had no selfcontrol astor house would probably own my bank account nngo here try everything great bbq and sides
authentic malaysian food price is good food is good plus it looks like a familyowned small businessi like the fact that my money may go towards a little boys education
the pizza in vegas is absolutely amazing known for being some of the best and they always have excellent deals on beer
this establishment serves exceptional pizza that is considered one of the best options in the area with regular promotions on their wide range of beer offerings
always very consistent food is always good but lately i have noticed that with the new management and chef the service has been a little slow i highly recommend the macadamia nut chicken so yummy

the atmosphere of the place was far from ideal with it being overcrowded and having an unpleasant smell the drink i had was alright and the price seemed fair regrettably someone clumsily knocked over my beverage due to their intense interest in my wife as she danced on the bar while i can somewhat understand their fascination i do appreciate that they bought me a replacement nevertheless im skeptical about returning to that establishment

i will not be returning the customer service is worse if thats possible they messed up my pizza order so they didnt send me a new pizzathey sent the topingbooooo at some point even dilivery and late schedule doesnt make it worth it but in a pinch and drunk i guess this place is ok

after hearing numerous praises about this establishment i became intrigued and decided to explore its allure however my experience fell short of expectations as everything turned out to be disappointing the wing sauce had excessive oil content and lacked any satisfactory flavor it would be wise to refrain from dining here and save your hardearned money

if there was an option to rate this less than one star i would gladly choose it i placed an order for some pizzas to be delivered to my office and i clearly remember being informed on the phone that the estimated delivery time would be between 30 and 45 minutes it has now been two full hours since then and we are sitting here with no signs of our food this entire ordeal has left us extremely disappointed with the service provided by glass nickel pizza and we have firmly decided that we will not be placing any future orders from them

unquestionably tacos el gordo stands out as the ultimate destination in las vegas for a remarkable and truly authentic mexican feast that wont break the bank after indulging in your initial serving of delectable tacos youll find yourself irresistibly drawn to return for another round this place effortlessly competes with anything ive ever experienced in southern california known as the mecca of genuine mexican gastronomy
